summary: An ordinance providing for the construction of a Bridge across the Northern Pacific Railway Company's right-of-way in Princeton Avenue produced, from the south line of Hawthorne Hills Addition to Sand Point Way, all in accordance with Resolution No. 10384 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of Payment by Bonds.
